Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution

Class AbstractExecution

java.lang.Object
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.AbstractExecution
All Implemented Interfaces:
Execution
Direct Known Subclasses:
FailOnErrorExecution, NeverFailExecution
public abstract class AbstractExecution
extends Object
implements Execution
Base class for Execution implementations.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud
See Also:
Execution
